Class UserFacade

java.lang.Object
fr.polytech.picknpic.bl.facades.user.UserFacade
public class UserFacade extends Object
The UserFacade class provides a unified interface to various user-related operations such as login, registration, and user management. It follows the Singleton design pattern to ensure only one instance exists.

  • Method Details

    • getInstance

      public static UserFacade getInstance()
      Retrieves the singleton instance of the UserFacade. Ensures that only one instance of the UserFacade exists throughout the application.
      Returns:
      The singleton instance of the UserFacade.

    • login

      public User login(String username, String password)
      Authenticates a user with the given username and password. Delegates the authentication process to the LoginFacade.
      Parameters:
      username - The username of the user attempting to log in.
      password - The password of the user attempting to log in.
      Returns:
      A User object containing the authenticated user's details, or null if the credentials are invalid.

    • register

      public User register(String email, String password, String username, String firstName, String lastName, int phoneNumber)
      Registers a new user with the specified details. Delegates the registration process to the RegisterFacade.
      Parameters:
      email - The email address of the user to register.
      password - The password of the user to register.
      username - The username of the user to register.
      firstName - The first name of the user to register.
      lastName - The last name of the user to register.
      phoneNumber - The phone number of the user to register.
      Returns:
      A User object containing the registered user's details.

    • createUser

      public boolean createUser(String email, String password, String username, String firstName, String lastName, int phoneNumber, boolean admin)
      Creates a new user with the specified details. Delegates the user creation process to the ManageUsersFacade.
      Parameters:
      email - The email address of the user to create.
      password - The password of the user to create.
      username - The username of the user to create.
      firstName - The first name of the user to create.
      lastName - The last name of the user to create.
      phoneNumber - The phone number of the user to create.
      admin - Indicates whether the user has admin privileges.
      Returns:
      true if the user was created successfully, false otherwise.

    • updateUser

      public boolean updateUser(User user)
      Updates the details of an existing user. Delegates the user update process to the ManageUsersFacade.
      Parameters:
      user - The User object containing the updated user details.
      Returns:
      true if the user was updated successfully, false otherwise.

    • deleteUser

      public void deleteUser(int id)
      Deletes a user with the specified ID. Delegates the user deletion process to the ManageUsersFacade.
      Parameters:
      id - The unique identifier of the user to delete.

    • readUser

      public User readUser(int id)
      Retrieves the details of a user with the specified ID. Delegates the user retrieval process to the DisplayUsersFacade.
      Parameters:
      id - The unique identifier of the user to retrieve.
      Returns:
      A User object containing the user's details.
